Name: treatment of used vegetable cooking oil, purified, esterification | glycerine | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
Description: Typical waste oil esterification plant designed for methyl ester production (for the vehicle fuels market), Quebec context. Based on industrial data from one biodiesel producer in the Quebec region with a low production volume (2 000 000 litres of biodiesel per year).  The transesterification is base-catalysed with sodium methoxide and sodium hydroxide.
Tags: single enterprise data,Sector: Waste Treatment & Recycling
